description.translate: The strict necessities are never enough for you.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Skéléo\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Le strict nécessaire n'est jamais\"}","{\"text\":\"§7assez à ta convenance.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The strict necessities are\"}","{\"text\":\"§7never enough for you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HUN§a1 §7HER§c-1\"}"]}}
